scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server-node" "npm run server-fastapi" "npm run client
scripts.server-node: cd IT-HUB/server && npm install  && npm run server
scripts.server-fastapi: cd IT-HUB/server-fastapi &&  pip install -q -r requirements.txt && python main.py
scripts.client: cd IT-HUB/client && npm install && npm run dev
